body.name: SelectSoma Ergonomic Gel Seat Cushion for Long Sitting Pressure Relief for Back, Sciatica, Coccyx, Tailbone Pain – Office Chair Cushion, Wheelchair Cushions, Truck and Car Seat Cushion - Chair Pad

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Colors Vary With Blue Or Purple Gel; Black Cover

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 5 mins
features: While other Gel Cushions are too small, uncomfortable, and not enough support, the SelectSoma Enhanced Blue High Grade Gel Cushion with Double Thickness is Large and provides Maximum Support for Complete Comfort while being Soft on Pressure Points.

[You Need Lightweight and Portable] Use our gel seat cushion for office chair, dining chairs, while driving, airplane travel, stadium seating, picnics, or even sitting on the floor. Our double seat cushion is light and flexible which makes it easy use anywhere!

[Get the Pain Relief You Deserve] Our wheelchair cushion for pressure relief is perfect to help with lower back, sciatic nerve, tailbone pain relief, coccyx, butt and hip pain. Our egg seat cushion has an ergonomic design to help avoid numbness in the buttock’s muscles and lumbar strain.

[Enjoy the Coolness] Our Blue seat cushion has a therapeutic thick honeycomb gel design to increase air flow for ultimate cooling comfort to prevent seat sweat and a ventilated mesh cover that does not get hot, unlike the memory foam models.

[No Worry Water Resistant Gel and Washable Cover] Our gel seat pad can also be used while bathing, swimming, boating, kayaking, kneeling while gardening, or on outdoor patio chairs. Our gel cushion even has an EXTRA BONUS 2nd machine washable cover!

[Versatile Seat Cushion] - Our product can help with sitting for long hours and can work as a gaming or computer chair cushion. Relieves bodily aches and serve as chair cushions for elderly. Also serves as an adult booster seat for the car as well.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy All the Benefits Our Cushion Has to Offer The SelectSoma Gel Seat Cushion is the perfect way to help alleviate all the aches and pains associated with sitting for long periods of time. Stop suffering and start living pain free when you add the comfort of our gel cushion for sitting ANYWHERE.

UPGRADED HONEYCOMB STRUCTURE UPGRADED HONEYCOMB STRUCTURE greatly reduces heat transfer between the buttocks and the seat, increases air circulation and keeps you cool. No more seat sweat! DOUBLE LAYER THICKNESS DOUBLE LAYER THICKNESS for more support that disperses pressure evenly. Take comfort in knowing our gel is strong and will not break down over time! FLEXIBLE and PORTABLE FLEXIBLE and PORTABLE which makes it easy use anywhere. Enjoy being comfortable and take it with you wherever you go! NON-SLIP CUSHION COVER NON-SLIP CUSHION COVER can easily be removed and is machine washable. There is also an EXTRA cover included.!

UPGRADED PREMIUM DESIGN UPGRADED PREMIUM DESIGN providing maximum support for complete comfort while being soft on pressure points! Comes in standard and large. EASY TO USE EASY TO USE for traveling, driving, attending recreational sporting events, picnics, water activities, and much more! AIR MESH COVER AIR MESH COVER allows for a maximum amount of air flow through the gel cushion. The cover and the honeycomb design creates a coolness you will enjoy! HIGH QUALITY GEL HIGH QUALITY GEL that hugs the buttocks and tailbone while maintaining its shape. This will make anything you sit on feel more comfortable!

Get the Pain Relief You Deserve It is especially difficult for people with back pain to sit comfortably. Our gel seat cushions for pressure relief are designed to relieve pain from the lower back, lumbar, hip, tailbone and coccyx areas. Stop suffering and start living pain free when you add the comfort of our gel cushion for sitting ANYWHERE.

Enjoy being Comfortable Anywhere Our versatile gel seat cushion for office chairs, dining chairs, cars, airplanes, wheelchairs, picnics and even floor sitting. Water resistant, it can also be used while swimming, boating, kayaking, gardening and outdoor seating. Stay comfortable ANYWHERE you go!

SelectSoma Gel Seat Cushion SelectSoma Large Gel Seat Cushion SelectSoma Portable Cross Grid Gel Cushion SelectSoma Grey Luxury Bath Pillow SomaSleep Cooling Adjustable Memory Foam Pillow SomaSleep Cooling Knee Pillow Enjoy all the products we offer! The perfect way to help alleviate all the aches and pains associated with sitting for long periods of time. Stop suffering and start living pain free when you add the comfort of our gel cushion for sitting ANYWHERE. Upgraded larger cushion 18.5x17.5 with double layer thickness for more support that disperses pressure evenly and a honeycomb gel structure that reduces heat transfer between the buttocks and the seat, increases air circulation and keeps you cool. The Cross Grid travel cushion comes with two handles for easier carrying and the larger gel border band helps to hold the seat structure together and gives much better overall stability and support. Our portable seat cushion goes anywhere you go! Turn your bathtub into a home spa getaway with the SelectSoma Grey Ultrasoft Luxury Bath Pillow. Not only does this pillow fit any tub but the beautiful custom color will not show stains like most white pillows. Enjoy the comfort you deserve! Wake up feeling refreshed and invigorated with our New Cooling Adjustable Pillow! The curved design gives your shoulders more room and head support perfect for any sleep position. Enjoy the increased comfort, softness and coolness while dreaming! The Cooling Knee Pillow offers relief and support for the legs and knees by providing comfortable cushioning and proper sleeping alignment, making it the best option for those seeking to eliminate painful pressure points while sleeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This model is the silencer
reviews.reviewText: This model is the silencerBest one I've found!BUT Should not be over $24.99Buy a set for the family and play hot potato!They include 2 black zipper covers with each, very convenient for the long drives that end up requiring a surprise change of scenery.Super soft vibration absorption protection for the most damaged of O-rings on there way out. It is soft ribbed for your enjoyment handling bumps with ease and with highway speeds of air or higher air friction showing no signs of ripped material in the aftermath.The ribbed "SILENCER" contor helps control air noise and acts a sound deadening as to not disturb/alert your passengers.Very easy to clean up after dried soiled spots of contamination sit for long periods just rinse in hot water, dry and switch with the passenger cusion and the game of Hot Potato begins!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I broke my coccyx back in June and still for long periods of time is causes a lot pain especially when I fly. The last trip I went on I used a donut and it didn't help much. I am so happy I got this cushion! I was able to sit on my flight without pain and didn't have to get up and move constantly just for relief. This has now be come my travel cushion and will bring it everywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Much better cushion than others
reviews.reviewText: I had tried one of the molded memory phone cushions in my office chair. It made the pain in my hips and backs so much worse. I decided to give this a try instead of the experience purple cushion. I'm so glad I did. This is incredibly comfortable and I can sit for much longer periods without pain.The only thing that keeps me from giving it five stars is that it does slip around on the chair when I get up. But it doesn't move when I'm sitting on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The extra large cushion necessary for driver seat
reviews.reviewText: I was apprehensive with ordering this cushion based on the reviews, but once I read most of them it seemed the biggest complaint were the size of the regular pad. Do I order the extra large and it fits perfectly on the driver seat of my semi truck. I drive an international day cab and that seat feels like a piece of plywood with fabric over it and this has changed it completely. Saved a bunch of money over the other color name brand pad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh.. It's not worse.
reviews.reviewText: The best I can say is it is a very slight improvement. It certainly isn't worse.It's just too soft. You can fully crush it with your hands, so needless to say under full body weight, its not doing much. I am thinking about grabbing one from the 'more expensive' brand to see if those are any different. But this isn't great.One or the other will get returned. I guess we'll find out later. But for now I don't know if all of these mats are the same, or if there is some difference from one brand to the next. What I do know is that this one didn't perform as expected.***UPDATE***I bought the 'name brand' version that costs ~$100ish after being disappointed with this one. I have them both here as I type. The name brand one is vastly superior. It is thicker, denser and more comfortable. SO if you're on the fence and can afford the other one, just save yourself some headache and do that. While it may not be 3x better as the price is 3x more.. It is at least twice as good. I'll be returning this one and keeping the 'name brand' one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this in my chair, and in my car, and on my lawnmower. I have a bad back and this helps especially when riding on bumpy roads and turf. It is large enough to cover most seats also.My wife gives it a thumbs up also. Ha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars takes the presssure away very effectively from the back muscles and tendons above the knee
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to test this product for myself before buying it for my uncle and aunt who experience pain after sitting for a long while on any type of surface. I myself have been having problems getting up after sitting down to work for extended periods. The SelectSoma Large Gel Seat Cushion really came to the rescue. After trying it out for a full week of desk work, I can say that pain from standing up from the seated position is almost gone. I need only do a little stretch and I'm good to go. No pain. I also noticed that the pain I used to have from sciatica is also gone. I will be buying 2 more for my uncle and aunt and another one to use in my car as well. What a wonderful product! I give it 97/100 points! If it could be increased in size by 10 cm more, the score would be 100! Thank you SelectSoma Large Gel Seat Cushion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This made our cross country trip more tolerable. However, it does get hot and cold with the temperature of the car/weather. However, when it got hit, I was unable to tolerate sitting on it.
I bought this to relieve any discomfort driving long distances. This cushion definitely made a difference and I am very satisfied with my purchase.Thank you!

I purchased this for my secret labs titan XL chair and this cushion is the perfect size for the seat. It also has little grippy dots on the bottom of the cushion to prevent it from sliding which work really well also.

reviews.reviewTitle: It makes driving my Corolla much more comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I use this product in the driver's seat of my corolla. It fits in the seat cavity nicely. It makes the ride comfortable. It is thick enough to be comfortable yet thin enough as not to bother the leg with its front edge.
